name: Underweald
description:
Following catastrophic tectonic movements, ships have begun disappearing over Monterey canyon. Your marine expedition has brought to light the unearthing of strange minerals beneath the waves, which produce inexplicable physical and psychedelic effects. Seek out that which pulls you to it. Discover the truth beneath the depths.


Created as a weekend project for Otter Jam, Spring 2022.

Please download UnderwealdWindows_FixedResolution.zip for the best experience.

Known Issues

Web Version is not yet playable. Please download the file to play

Picking up the first crystal before dialogue disappears will bug the UI tracker

HUD does not scale correctly to some resolutions

UnderwealdWindows_FixedResolution.zip

Thank you for playing!
